title: The United Statesâ€™ Unamendable Constitution
alt: A chart of constitutional amendments over time.
info: I contributed data visualization and development to this article by historian Jill Lepore about the history of efforts to amend the U.S. Constitution. Components included a set of interactive survey questions exploring Americans' attitudes toward the Constitution, as well as a longform annotated timeline visualizing more than 10,000 failed amendments.
